Articles.Content: Do they? Just making sure before I screw around too much with them. I haven't played in awhile, so I'm really not sure about the compatiblity.

I'm not aware of any mod that worked in 0.20 that doesn't work in 0.20.2, and very few that work in 0.20.2 that don't work in 0.20, and those that I'm aware of are clearly labeled. I'm assuming 0.2.0 is a typo, either on your part or theirs, since 0.2 had no addon support and was never released to buyers.
